title: Salesman's Sample, early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, ?
Technique: embroidery and applique on woven satin foundation
description: Small panel of blue-green satin with border design embroidered with white, blue, yellow and orchid silks; green, white and orchid chenille; with white satin and net appliqué. Pattern of wisteria and large pointed leaves with lower bands of arabesques.

tombstone.epitaph:
Salesman's Sample, early 19th century. Medium: silk, ?
Technique: embroidery and applique on woven satin foundation. 1898-2-1.
